name: botcynx-typescript
description: a discord bot made in typescript based on an earlier project

scripts.quickstart:dev: npm run build && node dist/index.js --setEnv dev --showCallStack true --showDiscordAPIErrors true
scripts.quickstart:debug: npm run build && node dist/index.js --setEnv debug --showCallStack true --showDiscordAPIErrors true
scripts.pm2:dev: pm2 start --no-daemon --name botcynx-dev dist/index.js -- --setEnv dev --showCallStack true --showDiscordAPIErrors true
scripts.pm2:debug: pm2 start --no-daemon --name botcynx-debug dist/index.js -- --setEnv debug --showCallStack true --showDiscordAPIErrors true

author: Ascynx
